message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product comes with advanced features and unparalleled quality that sets it apart from others in the market. Considering its exceptional value, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $20000. I believe this is a fantastic opportunity for you to experience the benefits of our product while enjoying a significant discount. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I'm looking for something within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $15000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your pricing strategy.
